title: How to Win Friends and influence people
description: How to Win Friends and Influence People by Dale Carnegie is a self-help classic that reads as a life manual. The core idea is that you can change other people‚Äôs behavior simply by changing your own. It teaches you the principles to better understand people, become a more likable person, improve relationships, win others over, and influence behavior through leadership.
author: Dale Carnegie

review.name: Shahriar Ahmed Sajid
review.comment: Best book that I read ever!

review.name: Nur Farhan Shariar Pranto
review.comment: This is a book for those who wants to succeed in life and win over friends!

review.name: Sourav Laskar
review.comment: The book is so interesting and also effective for personal improvement!

title: Body Language
description: The Definitive Book of Body Language ‚Äì by Barbara Pease & Allan Pease. The Definitive Book of Body Language reveals that studies have shown that only 7% of our communication is verbal (what we say). 38% is vocal (how we say it) and the remaining 55% is non-verbal (what we do with our body language and our gestures).
author: Allan Pease

review.name: Joy Sarker
review.comment: The book is really good for any kinds of readers!

review.name: Md. Khaled Hasan
review.comment: Best book that I evr read on Body Language.

title: The Understanding Of Free Trade Agreements
description: This book delves into an objective assessment of the SAFTA from fresh perspectives. For that, the author explored various provisions of NAFTA and GATT. The author firmly believes that the SAARC may play an instrumental role in ensuring an effective South Asian intra-trade system.
author: Md. Neyamul Islam

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Pride and Prejudice follows the turbulent relationship between Elizabeth Bennet, the daughter of a country gentleman, and Fitzwilliam Darcy, a rich aristocratic landowner. They must overcome the titular sins of pride and prejudice in order to fall in love and marry.
author: Jane Austen

review.name: Saidul Islam
review.comment: Tough but very authentic love story!

title: Fire and Fury : Inside The Trump White House
description: Fire and Fury: Inside the Trump White House is a 2018 book by journalist Michael Wolff which according to Wolff, details the behavior of U.S. President Donald Trump, the staff of his 2016 presidential campaign, and the White House staff. The title refers to a quote by Trump about the conflict with North Korea.
author: Michael Wolff

review.name: Sayeed Mohammad
review.comment: Since Donald Trump was sworn in as the 45th President of the United States, the country‚Äïand the world‚Äïhas witnessed a stormy, outrageous, and absolutely mesmerizing presidential term that reflects the volatility and fierceness of the man elected Commander

title: The Serpents Shadow
description: The Chaos Snake, Apophis, is back! Carter and Sadie Kane journey around the world to try and keep him in check, but they fail. Now, the Kanes must somehow destroy Apophis before he swallows the entire world. However, they‚Äôre almost alone in this battle. The magicians of the House of Life are busy squabbling amongst themselves and the gods are divided. The only hope the Kanes still have is an old spell that can turn the serpent‚Äôs shadow against it. However, that magic has been long lost. To find it, they need to trust the crazy ghost of a dead magician. The Kane Chronicles spins towards its end in this climactic finale.
author: Rick Riordan

title: Ikigai
description: The Ikigai book introduces you to various topics related to the art of living, such as the blue zones, longevity, logotherapy, flow, yoga, tai chi, and resilience. It defines what Ikigai is and its rules. The book says that living a long and full life is under your control to an extent.
author: Hector Garcia & Francesc Miralles

review.name: Arif Faisal
review.comment: Informative book and as well as interesting alsoüß°

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
description: The Ikigai book introduces you to various topics related to the art of living, such as the blue zones, longevity, logotherapy, flow, yoga, tai chi, and resilience. It defines what Ikigai is and its rules. The book says that living a long and full life is under your control to an extent.
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

review.name: Shahriar
review.comment: A book which surely needed for the persons want to change their future as well as the country. The book clearly elongated the perspective of economic conditions by describing the cash flow diagrams of practical life. This book is not just about money.

review.name: Tawfiq Ahmed
review.comment: A unique perspective on wealth and financial mindset. Lots of good and pertinent information. A must read book.
